name: jcwp youtube channel embed
author: JasChahal

sections.description:
This plugin embeds a custom channel to wordpress page or post

This plugin is ShortCode based. Shortcode can be generated by a click of a button from settings page. Shortcode format is shown below

[jcorg_youtube_channel mode=”list|thumbnails” videoWidth=”640″ thumbnailWidth=”240″ showTitle=”yes|no” maxResults=”6″ startIndex=”1″ orderBy=”published|relavance|viewcount” filterKeyword=”” channelName=”” embedType=”frame|object”]

You can follow me on Twitter https://twitter.com/jschahal or
like my facebook page http://www.facebook.com/jaspreetchahal.org to get updates on some not so exciting things that I do.

Visit my site http://jaspreetchahal.org to get help on this plugin or more precisely go to http://jaspreetchahal.org/wordpress-youtube-channel-embed-plugin

All my wordpress plugins can be found either under my account info or http://jaspreetchahal.org/category/software-by-jc/wordpress-plugins/

Screenshots ==-

  1. A screen shot of the options page
  2. Shows mode: list
  3. shows mode:thumbnails

Donations

If you would like to donate to help support future development of this plugin, please go to Jaspreet Chahal
sections.installation:
1. Upload unzipped plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the Plugin Options on left menu under Settings > JCWP Youtube embed.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Initial Release

1.1

  • Compatible with IE7 and IE8
  • keyword filter had some issues which has now been resolved

1.2

  • Fixed shortcode generation javascript code.

1.5

  • You can now adjust quality of your thumbnails and Initial video frame.

1.5.1

  • Moved optional back link to footer.

2.0.0

  • Compatible with Youtube API version 3
  • You will need Youtube API key for this plugin to work.
